articles.title: New US Migrant Processing Centres Become Waiting Rooms For Asylum Seekers - NDTV
articles.description: The opening of US migrant processing centers in Colombia, Costa Rica and Guatemala ensures that more than ever these countries will become waiting rooms for asylum seekers wanting American visas.
articles.content:
US officials believe the new processing centers will make it easier for migrants. (Representational)
San Jose, Costa Rica: The opening of US migrant processing centers in Colombia, Costa Rica and Gu… [+4094 chars]
